abstract: Shares in Clorox jumped 7.6 percent after the activist investor disclosed owning a stake of nearly 9.1 percent.
snippet: Shares in Clorox jumped 7.6 percent after the activist investor disclosed owning a stake of nearly 9.1 percent.
lead_paragraph: Is Carl C. Icahn eager to help clean up Clorox?

headline.main: Clorox Shares Jump as Icahn Discloses a Stake

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
